thread.title: Income tax tables: How the summer Budget affects you
thread.title_full: Income tax tables: How the summer Budget affects you

author: Money reporters
title: Income tax tables: How the summer Budget affects you
text:
Source: Blick Rothenberg 
Assumptions: 
• Where both members of a couple are earning, the income is split two thirds to one third 
• All earners work 30+ hours 
• No investment income received 
• All children are under 16 
• Tables include tax credits (working and child tax credits and child benefit where applicable) 
• No pension contributions or Gift Aid payments 
• For 2016/17, where no published rates, thresholds or allowances; estimates are based on announcements in the Budget inline, with RPI and CPI increases 
• Tables do not include blind person's allowance 
• NIC - For 2016/17 estimates were used as rates are pending the outcome of a consultation on Class 2 & Class 4 NIC
